name: Leviathan
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.Legendary Resistance (3/Day): If the leviathan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
traits.Partial Freeze: If the leviathan takes 50 cold damage or more during a single turn, the leviathan partially freezes; until the end of its next turn, its speeds are reduced to 20 feet, and it makes attack rolls with disadvantage.
traits.Siege Monster: The leviathan deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Tidal Wave).
traits.Water Form: The leviathan can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

options.Slam (Costs 2 Actions): The leviathan makes one slam attack.
options.Move: The leviathan moves up to its speed.
